00022 /**
00023  * @file apt-copynumber-cyto.cpp
00024  *
00025  * @brief This file contains the housekeeping code for the apt-copynumber-cyto module.
00026  */
00027 
00028 #ifdef _DEBUG
00029 #ifndef _WIN64
00030 #ifdef _USE_VLD
00031 #include "../../../external/vld/vld.h"
00032 #endif
00033 #endif
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 //
00037 #include "copynumber/CNAnalysisMethodChipstream.h"
00038 #include "copynumber/CNAnalysisMethodFactory.h"
00039 #include "copynumber/CNCytoEngine.h"
00040 //
00041 #include "chipstream/EngineUtil.h"
00042 #include "util/AptVersionInfo.h"
00043 #include "util/Fs.h"
00044 #include "util/LogStream.h"
00045 #include "util/PgOptions.h"
00046 #include "util/TmpFileFactory.h"
00047 #include "util/Util.h"
00048 
00049 
00050 using namespace std;
00051 
00052 int main(int argc,const char* argv[]) 
00053 {
00054   ofstream logOut;
00055   LogStream log;
00056   string logName;
00057     
00058   try {
00059     // make sure the file5 library has been started.
00060     affx::File5_open();
00061     
00062     CNCytoEngine engine;
00063     
00064     const string version = AptVersionInfo::version();
00065     const string cvsId = AptVersionInfo::cvsId();
00066     const string versionToReport = AptVersionInfo::versionToReport();
00067     const string execGuid = affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid();
00068     
00069     /* Parse options. */
00070     engine.setUsage(
00071             "apt-copynumber-cyto - A program to compute copy number \n"
00072         "results from DNA analysis arrays.\n\n"
00073             "sample usage for CytoScanHD:\n"
00074             "   ./apt-copynumber-cyto "
00075             " --cyto2 false"
00076             " --run-geno-qc true"
00077             " <OPTIONS>"
00078         " \n\n"
00079         "sample usage for Cytogenetics_Array:\n"
00080             "   ./apt-copynumber-cyto"
00081             " --cyto2 true"
00082             " --run-geno-qc false"
00083             " <OPTIONS>"
00084         " \n\n"
00085         "where <OPTIONS> are as described bellow.\n"
00086         "(See apt-copynumber-cyto.html manual and vignettes for recommended parameters.)");
00087     
00088     engine.parseArgv(argv);
00089     Verbose::setLevel(engine.getOptInt("verbose"));
00090     const string progName = Fs::basename(engine.getProgName());
00091     engine.setOpt("command-line",engine.commandLine());
00092     engine.setOpt("program-name",progName);
00093     engine.setOpt("program-company","Affymetrix");
00094     engine.setOpt("program-version",version);
00095     engine.setOpt("program-cvs-id",cvsId);
00096     engine.setOpt("version-to-report",versionToReport);
00097     engine.setOpt("exec-guid",execGuid);
00098 
00099     if(argc == 1) { engine.setOpt("help","true"); }
00100 
00101     engine.openStandardLog("apt-copynumber-cyto.log",logOut,log);
00102     
00103     // Check Options. Will print out version/help if requested then exit.
00104     try {engine.checkOptions();}
00105     catch(const exception& e) {
00106         Err::errAbort("Exception caught in main checkOptions(): " + ToStr(e.what()));
00107     }
00108     catch(...) {
00109         throw;
00110     }
00111 
00112     engine.run();
00113   } 
00114   catch(...) {
00115       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00116       // Close log files
00117       logOut.close();
00118       return 1;
00119   }
00120   // Close log files
00121   logOut.close();
00122 
00123   return 0;
00124 }
